sen.j: 並木 五瓶（なみき ごへい）は歌舞伎狂言作者の名跡。
sen.e: Gohei NAMIKI was a professional name of a playwright of Kabuki kyogen.
Gohei NAMIKI was a professional name of a playwright of Kabuki play.
sen.cmt: 歌舞伎狂言を定訳に合わせました。
sen.e: Gohei NAMIKI was a professional name of a playwright of Kabuki play.
The name was passed down through four generations.
The name was passed down through the fourth generation.
sen.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。
sen.e: The name was passed down through the fourth generation.

tit.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。

sen.e: (He was born on 1747 and passed away on Feburuary 27, 1808.)
(He was born in 1747 and passed away on February 27, 1808.)
(He was born in 1747 and passed away on February 27, 1808.)

sen.j: 大坂道修町で和泉屋の子。
sen.e: He was born in Izumiya in Doshomachi, Osaka.
He was a son of Izumiya, which ran its business in Doshomachi, Osaka.
sen.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。
sen.e: He was a son of Izumiya, which ran its business in Doshomachi, Osaka.

sen.j: 並木正三の門下で吾八（五八、呉八とも）の名で浜芝居で修行。
sen.e: He worked hard in 'hamashibai (a small theater in Dotonbori in Edo period)' under Shozo NAMIKI, using Gohachi as his pen name.
sen.cmt: 吾八（五八、呉八）の漢字表記の差異は表現しておりません。
sen.e: He trained himself in Hamashibai (a small theater in Dotonbori in the Edo Period) under Shozo NAMIKI, with his pen name, Gohachi.
sen.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。
sen.e: He trained himself in Hamashibai (a small theater in Dotonbori in the Edo Period) under Shozo NAMIKI, with his pen name, Gohachi.
He changed his name to Gohei NAMIKI in 1777.
sen.cmt: 五兵衛は「ごへい」と読むのであろう、と推測しました。
sen.e: He changed his name to Gohei (五兵衛) NAMIKI in 1777.
He changed his name to Gohei (五兵衛) NAMIKI in 1777.
He used different Kanji characters for his name in 1793; the sound was the same as the former one.
sen.cmt: 五兵衛、五瓶はおそらく同じ「ごへい」であろう、と推測しました。
sen.e: In 1793, he started to use different Kanji characters '五瓶', which had the same pronunciation of the original ones, for his name.
sen.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。
sen.e: In 1793, he started to use different Kanji characters '五瓶', which had the same pronunciation of the original ones, for his name.

sen.j: 翌年の1794年に澤村宗十郎 (3代目)の推薦で江戸に下り狂言作者として活躍。
sen.e: In 1794, he went to Edo at the recommendation of Sojuro SAWAMURA (the third) and worked hard as a playwright of Kabuki kyogen.
In 1794, the next year, he went to Edo (then capital of Japan) by recommendation of Sojuro SAWAMURA (the third) and became an eminent playwright of Kabuki play.
sen.cmt: 江戸の補足説明を追記しました。英文を書き換えました。
sen.e: In 1794, the next year, he went to Edo (then capital of Japan) by recommendation of Sojuro SAWAMURA (the third) and became an eminent playwright of Kabuki play.

sen.j: 時代物、世話物に優れた作品を残す。
sen.e: He left masterpieces of Jidaimono (Historical drama) and Sewamono (play dealing with the lives of ordinary people).
He left masterpieces of Jidaimono (Historical drama) and Sewamono (play dealing with the lives of ordinary people).
He left masterpieces of Jidaimono (Historical drama) and Sewamono (play dealing with the lives of ordinary people).

sen.j: 主な作品に「五大力恋緘」「富岡恋山開」「隅田春妓女容性」等がある。
sen.e: His major works included 'Godairiki Koi no Fujime,' 'Tomioka Koi no Yamahiraki,' and 'Sumida no haru geisha katagi.'
sen.cmt: 「富岡恋山開」の読み方が確認できませんでした。
sen.e: His major works are 'Godairiki Koi no Fujime,' 'Tomigaoka Koi no Yamabiraki,' and 'Sumida no Haru Geisha Katagi.'
sen.cmt: 富岡恋山開：とみがおかこいのやまびらき
sen.e: His major works are 'Godairiki Koi no Fujime,' 'Tomigaoka Koi no Yamabiraki,' and 'Sumida no Haru Geisha Katagi.'

tit.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。

sen.e: (He was born in 1768 and passed away on August 27, 1819.)
(He was born in 1768 and passed away on August 27, 1819.)
(He was born in 1768 and passed away on August 27, 1819.)

sen.j: 初代五瓶の門人で初名を初代篠田金治という。
sen.e: The second Gohei NAMIKI was a disciple of the first and his original name was Kinji SHINODA, the first.
sen.cmt: 篠田金治の読み方が確認できませんでした。
sen.e: Gohei NAMIKI the second was a disciple of the first, and his original name was Kinji SHINODA the first.
sen.cmt: 篠田金治：しのだ きんじhttp://www.wul.waseda.ac.jp/kotenseki/search.php?cndbn=%8E%C2%93c+%8B%E0%8E%A1
sen.e: Gohei NAMIKI the second was a disciple of the first, and his original name was Kinji SHINODA the first.

sen.j: 1818年に2代目五瓶を襲名も翌年の1819年に没。
sen.e: Although he succeeded to the second Gohei NAMIKI in 1818, he passed away in 1819.
Although he succeeded to Gohei NAMIKI the second in 1818, he passed away in 1819, the next year.
sen.cmt: the next year を追記しました。
sen.e: Although he succeeded to Gohei NAMIKI the second in 1818, he passed away in 1819, the next year.

tit.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。

sen.e: (He was born in 1789 and passed away on November 23, 1855.)
(He was born in 1789 and passed away on November 23, 1855.)
(He was born in 1789 and passed away on November 23, 1855.)

sen.j: 2代目五瓶の門人の2代目篠田金治が1833年に3代目五瓶を襲名。
sen.e: In 1833, the second Kinji SHINODA, a disciple of the second Gohei NAMIKI, succeeded to the third Gohei NAMIKI.
In 1833, Kinji SHINODA the second, a disciple of Gohei NAMIKI the second, succeeded to Gohei NAMIKI the third.
sen.cmt: ○代目の英訳を変更しました。
sen.e: In 1833, Kinji SHINODA the second, a disciple of Gohei NAMIKI the second, succeeded to Gohei NAMIKI the third.

sen.j: 名作「勧進帳」の作者として名を残す。
sen.e: He earned his place in history as the writer of 'Kanjincho.'
He is famous for his masterpiece 'Kanjincho.'
sen.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。
sen.e: He is famous for his masterpiece 'Kanjincho.'

tit.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。

sen.e: (He was born in 1829 and passed away on August 1, 190.)
(He was born in 1829 and passed away on August 1, 1901.)
(He was born in 1829 and passed away on August 1, 1901.)

sen.j: 3代目五瓶の子の3代目篠田金治が並木五柳を経て4代目五瓶を襲名。
sen.e: The third Kinji SHINODA, the third Gohei's son succeeded to the fourth Gohei, after using the name of Goryu NAMIKI.
sen.cmt: 並木五柳の読み方が確認できませんでした。
sen.e: Kinji SHINODA the third, a son of Gohei NAMIKI the third succeeded to Gohei NAMIKI the fourth, after calling himself Goryu NAMIKI.
sen.cmt: 英文を書き換えました。
sen.e: Kinji SHINODA the third, a son of Gohei NAMIKI the third succeeded to Gohei NAMIKI the fourth, after calling himself Goryu NAMIKI.
